sentences.en: A near - infrared spectrometer based on an integrated optical acoustooptic tunable filter ( IAOTF ) is constructed.
sentences.cn: 研制成功一种基于集成光学声光可调谐滤波器 ( IAOTF ) 的新型近红外光谱仪.

sentences.en: A novel all fiber discrete tunable distributed back reflector ( DBR ) fiber laser is reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了一种新型全光纤离散可调谐分布反射 ( DBR ) 光纤激光器.

sentences.en: Alexandrite laser is one of the superior tunable solid - lasers.
sentences.cn: 紫翠宝石激光器是迄今为止较好的固体可调谐激光器之一.

sentences.en: Conclusion Tunable pulsed overtone Nd : YAG 532 nm laser was efficency to skin vascular lesions.
sentences.cn: 结论可变脉宽倍频nd:YAG532nm波长激光治疗皮肤血管异常性疾病疗效较好,但要严格掌握适用证.

sentences.en: Experiments are performed using a CW tunable CO 2 laser and SF 6 gas as nonlinear medium.
sentences.cn: 使用可调谐连续波CO_2激光器和SF_6气体作非线性介质作了实验研究.

sentences.en: Finite element - artificial transmitting method is applied for acoustooptic tunable filters ( AOTF ) with weighted coupling.
sentences.cn: 用有限元人工透射法计算权重耦合的可调谐声光滤波器 ( AOTF ).

sentences.en: Generally speaking, the greater the number of nodes, the more finely tunable the network becomes.
sentences.cn: 一般而言，节点的数量越多，网络的可调优性就更好。

sentences.en: In this a novel scheme for tunable wavelength conversion based on semiconductor - fiber ring laser is proposed.
sentences.cn: 可调谐波长转换器是智能化光网络中的关键光电子器件.

sentences.en: Inside this directory are many tunable settings.
sentences.cn: 在这个目录中，有许多可调的设置。

sentences.en: Linewidth - narrowed, tunable spectrum can be obtained by external cavity feedback laser diode array ( LDA ).
sentences.cn: 外腔反馈的激光二极管阵列 ( LDA ) 可获得窄线宽 、 可调谐的光谱输出.

sentences.en: Researchers realised that a tunable laser beam might be useful in surgery.
sentences.cn: 研究人员意识到，可调谐激光束也许可以用在外科手术中。

sentences.en: The dielectric tunable behaviors of BTS are consistent with Devonshire phenomenological theory.
sentences.cn: 研究发现,BTS材料 介电可调行为和Devonshire唯象理论吻合很好.

sentences.en: The excitation source was a flashlamp pumped Rhodamine tunable dye laser.
sentences.cn: 激发源为闪光灯泵可调谐若丹明染科激光器.

sentences.en: The properties of tunable filter based on micro - opto - electric - mechanic system technology driven by electrostatic force are analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析了基于微光机电系统的可 调谐滤波器 在静电力驱动下的一些特性.

sentences.en: The real time control of the tunable laser is realized with GPIB bus.
sentences.cn: 通过GPIB总线实现了对可调谐激光器的控制.

sentences.en: There are many tunable parameters to look at—you'll get to these parameters during subsequent phases of the series.
sentences.cn: 有许多可调整的参数值得研究，您将在本系列文章后续的内容中了解这些参数。

sentences.en: Wecan control the transformation of particle make use of the tunable time dependent Rabi frequency.
sentences.cn: 利用含时可调拉比频率可以实现可控制的粒子数转移.

words.tran_cn: 可调谐的；可调音的；和谐的；音调美的
